resources.string: There are two ways of inspecting images:
1)Long press of an image brings to inspect the single image. (Simple assignment task)

2)Simple press of an image put this image into "Selected Images". If a selected image is pressed in one of the two lists, it is removed from the list of selected images. You can select how many images you want and then inspect all the images of this selection by clicking on Open Selected Image Gallery. (Extra assignment task)
